resources.string: Updating... - Do not close the page!
UClass Smart Classroom provides independent services for different regions. Select your region before logging in.
Click a group below to view its screen
Request to enable floating (suspension) window failed!
The maximum number of screens allowed has been reached, no more can be selected!
A group screen (or more) is offline, ask students to open the UClass app on the group screen. \nIf UClass is on, ABC to re-connect the group screen.

Floating (Suspension) Window has to be enabled for UClass to run in the background during multi-screen broadcasting. Click the Confirm link to pop up the setting window and then enable Floating (Suspension) Window.
Multi-Screens feature requires a fixed IP address. Do not change the IP or connect to multiple networks (such as a wired one and Wi-Fi) at the same time.
Note: Do not change the group serial number of a screen unless necessary. If you did change the group serial number, refresh the teacher screen or restart the UClass app.

Failed to broadcast to the group screen! Check whether the group screen is online and try again. Click the Troubleshoot link on the group screen to check the screen status and then follow the instructions to troubleshoot.
The maximum number of whiteboard pages has been reached. No more could be added.
The content has not been saved. Unsaved content will be cleared when the whiteboard is closed. Are you sure you want to close the whiteboard?
Currently only supports opening files in the file saving path of UClass:
The whiteboard is not saved and will be overwritten by the newly opened one!
Failed to save - Change the file name and then try again!
Are you sure to you want to delete this page?
Welcome to the Multi-Screens feature of UClass!
The Multi-Screens feature is not activated yet!
If you have not purchased this service, please DEF. If you have purchased, please restart the App.
Tap the button on the right to start
Touch the screen and tap the 3x3 Grid Menu button on either side of the screen\nSwitch to another app or Windows system
For Android devices, use ULearning app to scan the QA code to cast.

Please check whether the IP address of the group screen is consistent with the pre-assigned IP address. Path: the group screen - Home > Settings > Advanced > Wired Network. If not consistent, change the group screen IP address or the pre-assigned IP address.
Check whether UClass of the group screen is running
Try to close and then reopen UClass of the teacher screen and group screen

On the teacher screen, tap the Troubleshoot link on UClass to view the networking information. Check whether the IP address of the group screen is consistent with the pre-assigned IP address. If not, change the group screen IP address or the pre-assigned IP address.
Edited successfully - Please close and then reopen UClass!
The format is incorrect - Check the parameters!
Current network: Wi-Fi. To ensure broadcast clarity and stability, please use a wired network!
If the group screen is offline:
The network information is incorrect - Use the backup file to repair!
Newer version available: UClass%s, do you want to update?
Your version is the latest version
If any group screen is offline, check whether UClass app on that screen is turned on.
Launched successfully! Broadcasting teacher screen to group screens...
Failed to launch! Click the Multi-Screens button on the right to manually launch the broadcast.
Open the cast screen and try again!
Unable to connect to the screen during broadcasting!
The number of screen casting devices supported by the smart board has reached the limit. Please wait until someone exits casting and try again.
ap AirPlay or Screen Mirroring to cast
Search and install ULearning app in the app store of your mobile device. Use ULearning app to scan the QR code to cast.
Search and install IdeaShare in the app store or browser of your device. Open IdeaShare and enter the casting code to cast. You can find the code at the upper-right corner of the smart board.
Connect to the classroom Wi-Fi to cast. Classroom Wi-Fi: %s \u00A0\u00A0\u00A0 Password: %s
Obtain Wi-Fi information from the classroom admin. Click the Edit button to enter the Wi-Fi name and password to save for future connections.

The smart board is a shared device, and there are potential risks in saving the whiteboard to this device. It is recommended to use the Share Content feature to save the whiteboard content to your ULearning course session on the cloud. After saving, you can open the whiteboard content from a different classroom for editing or share the content with your course session participants.
Enter the classroom Wi-Fi and password

UClass requires storage permissions. In order to quickly locate problems that occur during software operation, UClass needs to record the software\'s operation logs and store them locally. Tap Ok to enable storage permissions in the pop-up window.
Dual-writing is not allowed under this writing mode!
The screen recording function is being used by another app\nThis app stops recording the screen
The broadcast configuration is inconsistent. Please check the broadcast settings.
The IP address is inconsistent with the pre-assigned IP Address!
The network is unavailable - Please check the network connection!
The network is unstable - Please ensure the network works as expected!
This device doesn\'t support the whiteboard feature!
